Elijah LeeTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 17 Jun 2019Details are not known yet, so it is hard to tell. However, presuming you have Eldershield already, then it would be better to ensure you have enhanced it first. Should anything occur to your health between now and the introduction of careshield life (touch wood), you might not even be able to transit to careshield life at all. Should you still be healthy when careshield life is launched, then you may compare and decide if porting over is worth it.0 comments5

If its truly better and at a cheaper price, you can switch. Make sure that you're at least insured right now. Anything can happen within a year. Also, you can keep the ES supplement and still switch basic ES to Careshield Life as well. No harm there.
